Title: Una storia semplice
Writer: Leonardo Sciascia (novel), Andrea Barbato (screenplay), Emidio Greco (screenplay)
Actors: Gian Maria Volontè, Ennio Fantastichini, Ricky Tognazzi, Massimo Dapporto
Plot: Returning from abroad to Sicily, a former diplomat informs the police about a strange discovery he has just made. The next day, police inspector Lepri comes to the man's place and finds him...
